long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add Lokalyze to your browser today and you’ll be supporting your local economy, helping your nearby retailers and sticking 2 fingers up to the billionaire space cowboys of the world, all at the same time!

Lokalyze is the clever little extension that recognises when you’re browsing for retail items on major e-commerce websites like Amazon, eBay & Alibaba, and will pop up automatically to show your local stores that sell the same and similar items.

The choice to buy locally or not is then up to you - don’t worry we won’t judge. The important thing is that you and millions like you around the world will finally be your giving local, physical retailers visibility alongside the remote online giants, and no doubt you’ll find yourself choosing to buy from your local stores more than you might think.

In case you needed more convincing here’s 5 benefits to shopping locally rather than ‘globally’:
- Spending locally directly supports your local economy and neighborhood.
- Reduce waste & pollution from delivery vehicles & packaging.
- Friendly & informative service.
- Get those steps in.
- Get the item you want right away.
